metadata.name: An integrated world
metadata.description:
My own handmade work - made of gold leaf - paint - water and soil A combination of abstract art
This is how I made the words of my brain and the feeling of my heart
We can have an integrated world
Full of peace, equality and friendship
Without war and oppression
This can be a map from the hearts of the people of the world
Intertwined and side by side

The final output is produced from my original artwork (watercolor - gold leaf - acrylic)
